column4: yo, I plugged my usb stick into my machine but im not sure where to look to see if it auto mounted...
i just have a command line
just cdrom and cdrom0 and floppy and floppy0, theres nothing in them
also its a windows usbstick, i need to format it...
i just plugged it into the front of the pc, i could go down and stick it in the back...
shouldnt matter tho... i just cant remember if i plugged in those ports when i built the system
gotta go back down to the cupboard under the stairs lol
then check to see it there is voltage (4v) on the port
k its plugged into the back, and still not coming up in /media/
